script.title: Query To Table
script.description: Save query results into a BigQuery table.
instructions: Specify a single query and choose legacy or standard mode.
For PLX use user authentication and: SELECT * FROM [plx.google:FULL_TABLE_NAME.all] WHERE...
Every time the query runs it will overwrite the table.

field.name: legacy
field.description: Query type must match source tables.

field.name: table
field.description: Table to create from this query.
